query.result: Bibha remained. Wiping away her tears and carrying the weight of a stone in her heart, she fell at her grandfather's feet. Pale and thin, like a shadow, she silently did all the household chores. When Udayaditya showed her affection and asked her something, she lowered her eyes and smiled a little. In the evening, she tried to talk a little while sitting at Udayaditya's feet. When the queen scolded her and said something, she stood silently and listened, and finally drifted away like a piece of dark cloud. When someone held Bibha's chin and said, "Bibha, why are you getting so thin?" Bibha didn't say anything, she just smiled a little.
